userPermission.inGuild: You don't have permissions to use this command! To be able to use it, you need to have permissions to `{{perm}}`!
userPermission.inChannel: You don't have permissions in {{channel}} to use this command! To be able to use it, you need to have permissions to `{{perm}}`!

botPermission.inGuild: I wanted to do this command, but unfortunately I don't have permissions to `{{perm}}`! Ask someone from staff to give that permission to me! Thank you!
botPermission.inSpecificChannel: I wanted to do this command, but unfortunately I don't have permissions to `{{perm}}` in channel! Ask someone from staff to give that permission to me! Thank you!

error.missingArguments: without the necessary arguments, please check usage using `{{prefix}}help {{command}}`
error.discordError: Something went terribly wrong when executing this command... Sorry for the inconvenience. `{{error}}`
error.onlyDevs: Only special people can use this command :3

interaction.youCanNot: You cannot interact with this component, only the command author can.
interaction.noInteract: Wait a minute... you aren't {{user}}! This isn't for you, go away!
interaction.expired: Oops, you can't use that component, it expired {{time}} ago!
interaction.executeAgain: Você demorou muito tempo pra usar-ló, por favor, use o comando novamente... Desculpe!

error.notFoundImage: Sorry, but I couldn't find any images I can use! I tried to get images from links, attached images, mentioned user avatars, emojis... but I didn't find any of that in your message.
error.notFoundVideos: Sorry, but I couldn't find any videos I can use! I tried to get videos from links, attached videos... but I didn't find any of that in your message.
error.youReBanned:
You cannot use my commands, you are **banned**!
✍️ **|** Reason: `{{reason}}`
error.premiumOnly: You're not a premium user. To use this command, you need to be a premium user!

shop.addMe: ADD ME TO YOUR SERVER TO SUPPORT

onlyguilds: you cannot use this command in private messages!
mention: Hello! My prefix in this server is `{{prefix}}`, if you need help, use `{{prefix}}help`

cooldown.hours: Calm down! You need to wait **a few hours**, before you can execute another command!
cooldown.milliseconds: Calm down! You need to wait **a few {{time}}**, before you can execute another command!
cooldown.default: Calm down! You need to wait **{{time}} {{context}}**, before you can execute another command!

database.registeredUser: oops! All done, now you are registered in my Database!
database.registeredGuild: Oops, hello guys! Everything ready, now this guild is registered in my Database! Have fun.
database.notFoundProfile: I couldn't find your profile or your friend's profile in my database

coins.youDoNotHaveMoney: you don't have enough coins for that! You need claim more dailies my friend...
coins.invalidValue: invalid Kurama-Coins' value, please, can you put something valid? Please <3
coins.dontHaveEnoughMoney: you don't have enough **Kurama Coins** to execute this command, come back later when you have enough money to use this command.
coins.heDontHaveEnoughMoney: {{user}} don't have enough **Kurama Coins** to execute this command, come back later when they have enough money to use this command.
coins.applyRate: You need bet a little more, let's go! I need apply a tax, how you think I survive this crisis?

onlyguild: you cannot use this command in private messages!
blockedCommands: this channel was configured to not receive commands from me. Use commands on another channel!

invalidUsers.plural: I searched everywhere, mentions, messages, ID's and guilds, but it seems that {{list}} are not valid users.
invalidUsers.nouns: I searched everywhere for mentions, messages, ID's and servers, but it seems that `{{list}}` is not a valid user.
invalidUsers.none: I searched everywhere for mentions, messages, ID's and servers, but I couldn't find any valid users in your message.

invalidChannels: I did not identify any channels in your message, I search between mentions and ID's, try again!

embed: Hi {{inviter}}, I was recently added to` {{guild}} `, it's a pleasure to be available to help you and your team on this server. Anyway, I think it's time to introduce myself, in case you are getting to know me now, I'm {{name}}, a simple bot for Discord. My goal is to help as many people as possible on this platform, whether helping with **Moderation**, **Administration**, **Entertainment**, **Music** and many others!

And if you are really getting to know me now, I bet you are curious to know what I do, right? I do a lot of things, ban users, make an image command, play a song and many others. To see all my "skills" use `d!help`, I will send you several super cool commands about me.
And if you need help, don't forget, I have a **Support Server**, you can join it using {{support}}, get in there. I hope you are well received.
I hope you enjoyed the "little bit" I told you about, sorry to bother you and I hope to see you around.

moderation.youCannotPunish: You cannot punish `{{list}}`, as you do not have the necessary permissions to do so.
moderation.iCannotPunish: I cannot punish `{{list}}`, my position is less than that of the user to be punished! So that I can punish, climb my position to the top of the list of positions, thank you!
moderation.punishmentConfirm:
you are about to punish `{{list}}` on your server!

<:kurama_coffee:826415473775869962> **|** Click the <:certo:713730585989873767> to confirm the action or click at the <:errado:639895787983339531> to cancel the action.
moderation.notBePunished: user will not be punished! I hope he learns this time! <:kurama_knife:770307319325130753>
moderation.punished: ready, that idiot was punished! minus a riot on the server. registered reason `{{reason}}`

notOnServer.nouns: the {{list}} user exists, but is not on the server, and due to API limitations, I cannot kick that user.
notOnServer.plural: {{list}} users exist, but are not on the server, and due to API limitations, I cannot kick these users.

log.title: The staffs took action!
log.description: The user was punished for breaking the rules of **{{guild}}**, doing what, right? If you had read the <#{{rulesID}}> or if you were a less stupid person, maybe so she could stay here.
log.messageContent: Whoops! Is this a punished user? It looks like it! **{{userTag}} {{userID}}** was punished by `{{staffTag}} ({{staffID}})`

reaction_logs.added: {{user}} Reacted with the emoji in the message.

message.default: Sorry but you can not send this link here in this channel... If you think this is an error, look for the server management team.

pending_restart: **Scheduled update**, we would like to warn you that the bot can be restarted at any time, I will probably be back after ~1 minuto e 20 segundos after after restarting... Sorry for the inconvenience! <:kurama_sob:826430408173813820>
